rComments: I *loved* this class! Cathryn is awesome! The extra readings were really interesting and the weekly quizzes were actually fun! I have become a linguistics major because of this class. Would definitely recommend her and the class to everyone!

This is a lower division class with no pre-reqs and I still felt like I didn't know what was going on.  Here lectures are kind of boring and there are no sections (which actually would have been helpful).  No midterms or final either--just 2 papers, and she grades kind of hard on them.  All in all, boring but not unbarable.

This was an awesome class! The textbook was really dull, but the classes made it all seem fun, and her enthusiasm was really motivating. The problems were difficult - it's not an easy course - but she was really helpful and her explanations were really clear. I'd def. take another course from her.
